Package pl.polsl.lab.hangman.view

Class HangmanView

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.lab.hangman.controller.HangmanView
  • public class HangmanView
extends java.lang.Object
    View class, provides methods to print games state for user.
    Author:
    Pawel Potuczko

      • HangmanView

        public HangmanView()

    • Method Detail

      • printFirstView

        public void printFirstView()
        Provides Logo "Hangman" as first view seen in console.

      • refreshView

        public void refreshView​(java.lang.String actualWord,
                        java.lang.String lettersUsed,
                        java.lang.Integer mismatchCount)
        Method views actual state of the game. Views hangmans image, state of word, letters used to guess and how many mismatches actually were made.
        Parameters:
        actualWord - String word with revealed only guessed letters
        lettersUsed - String containing letters used, while trying to guess
        mismatchCount - Integer number of mismatches since start of the game

      • getWordFormatted

        private java.lang.String getWordFormatted​(java.lang.String actualWord)
        Returns actual word formatted to fancy display, enters spaces between all characters in word
        Parameters:
        actualWord - String word with revealed only guessed letters
        Returns:
        String, actual word with spaces between characters

      • printFinalView

        public void printFinalView​(boolean isWon,
                           java.lang.String chosenWord,
                           int mismatchCount)
        Views final screen for user. In winning scenario congratulates user, tells the word and how many mismatches had player. In losing scenario displays full hangman image and informs what was the correct word.
        Parameters:
        isWon - Flag informing if it is winning or losing scenario
        chosenWord - Word, which was to guess
        mismatchCount - Count of mismatches during the game
